content:
Zeker, hier is het aangepaste Engelse verhaal op basis van de definitieve Nederlandse versie:

In a faraway land, a young hero named Adan embarked on a journey seeking wisdom and truth. He began by navigating the **Creative (1)** forces of nature and embracing the **Receptive (2)** spirit. Adan faced many challenges along his journey, including times of **Difficulty at the Beginning (3)** and learning from his own **Naivety (4)**. He met wise mentors who taught him the importance of **Waiting (5)** and the power of **Conflict (6)**, as well as how to achieve **Unified Action (7)** and hold on to **Solidarity (8)**.

Adan's journey took him to a place where he discovered the beauty of **Taming the Power of the Small (9)** and learned to walk in **Care (10)**. He encountered **Peace (11)** and was faced with **Standstill (12)**. He experienced the joy of **Fellowship (13)** and the strength found in **Possession in Great Measure (14)**. Adan confronted the challenges of **Humility (15)** and **Enthusiasm (16)**, before finding balance in **Following (17)** and coming to understand the power of **Correcting (18)**.

He encountered the mysterious **Approach (19)** and the transformative energy of **Contemplation (20)**. Adan learned to cultivate **Biting Through (21)** and the wisdom of **Grace (22)**. He faced the complexities of **Splitting Apart (23)** and the need for **Return (24)**. Adan discovered the purity of **Innocence (25)** and the significance of **Taming the Power of the Great (26)**. He found the power in **Nourishment (27)** and faced the challenges of **Greatness in Excess (28)**.

Adan embraced the wisdom of **The Abysmal (29)** and reveled in the radiance of **The Clinging (30)**. He felt the connection of **Influence (31)** and experienced the security of **Duration (32)**. He saw the potential in **Retreat (33)** and harnessed the power of **Great Power (34)**. Adan was challenged by **Progress (35)** and faced the darkness of **Darkening of the Light (36)**.

The young hero explored the dimensions of **Family (37)** and faced the opposition of **Opposition (38)**. Adan learned about the liberation found in **Obstruction (39)** and the importance of **Deliverance (40)**. He discovered the dynamics of **Decrease (41)** and the abundance of **Increase (42)**. Adan encountered the enlightening power of **Breakthrough (43)** and the cautionary tale of **Coming to Meet (44)**.

He experienced the transformative nature of **Gathering Together (45)** and the enlightening force of **Pushing Upward (46)**. Adan found solace in **Oppression (47)** and the encouragement of **The Well (48)**. He embraced the revolution of **Revolution (49)** and experienced the harmony of **The Cauldron (50)**.

Adan encountered the challenges of **The Arousing (51)** and the stillness of **The Gentle (52)**. He learned the importance of **Development (53)** and the power of **The Marrying Maiden (54)**. He faced the adversity of **Abundance (55)** and the potential of **The Wanderer (56)**. Adan discovered the beauty of **The Gentle Wind (57)** and the compelling force of
